msbt.message: YOU! You forgot all about your promise to visit my house, didn't you?!I was sitting at home, all alone, waiting for you that whole time. I was so sure you'd keep your word.
Oh dear, I think I invited you to come over to my house Unfortunately, something urgent has come up!I'm terribly sorry about this, my dear. I do hope you'll come for a visit some other time.

Oh, , I've been meaning to come see you so I could apologize! I invited you over to my house, but then I wasn't there when I said I would be.<10_4 /> I'm so very sorry. If it's alright with you, I'd still like it if you came over to visit sometime.
